name: KWICK! Colors
description:
Changes colors of the kwick.de website. Choose your own colors via http://html-color-codes.info and insert them into the code.
Author: http://www.kwick.de/Shaun/blog/entry/134403989/how-to-kwick-farben-andern/
additional_info:

Version 0.3 (28.10.15) - Added background color for forum posts.
Version 0.4 (04.11.15) - Added background color for content area and social objects.
